about_the_game:
"Player" is a dangerous trade route, protecting Arm merchant Ship carrying merchants traveling through the "Starry Sky." You will fight with the Battle Titan 'Rainbow'."

It is a retro mechanic shooter based on Pixel Art with RPG-like growth Factors, and is being developed as a shooting RPG in which you destroy powerful enemies with the support of various Equipment and Allies.


Top View 2D Shooter (SH m`Up Genre) SHMUP
Inspired by the classic 90s shooter "Thunder Force" from Technosoft(テクノソフト) and the cop shooter "M.U.S.H.A.(Alester)" from (コンパイル)

Based on retro game play, we pursued intuitive fun.
Daggers tracking enemies, instantaneous Detshu functions, various subarms, energy shields, bodies of mercenaries and disciples of the same clan who assist Player, aircraft carrier-sized armed merchant ships, insect monsters bigger than imagination, and Battle Titans of the Asura Clan with absolute power!!



12 (+Alpha) Battle Stages!
consists of combat stages with a variety of environmental combat styles.
Rather than a bullet style that competes with the number of bullets, it borrows the shooting game elements such as aimed shooting that early shooting games
shooting game elements such as aimed shooting that early shooters pursued.


Martial Arts Factors , Flying swords & Special skills!!
Special skills, weapons, and characters from various civilizations appear. based on the original story, Use the martial arts system within the maintenance game. Instead of just playing a lot of ammunition Various weapons such as Spears, Axes, and memorization appear.




Little Background on the Martial Arts style
A top-view shooter genre (SHM`UP) game based on the world of the mechanized martial arts novel "Battle Titan Mu-Hon", which was serialized for 12 issues starting in May 1991 in a Korean hobby magazine ("HOBBIST").

It incorporates the mechanized martial arts style of the original “Battle Titan Mu-Hon”. and martial arts style of the original “Battle Titan Mu-Hon”. The Player 's journey begins when he receives an order from the Council of Elders.


Robot Animation style ARTWORK.
The game's art style is based on the giant robot anime style representative of the 90s, when the original game was made.
The game's artistic atmosphere and mechanic design were organized to set it apart.

A cartoonish intermission is added between each battle and intermission to run through the entire scenario.


Level UP!, Equipment, Skill System
With RPG elements, you can acquire / trade / five different pieces of equipment to adapt to different combat environments, including lasers, force cannons, force swords, force blades, extra combustion chambers, force shields, and more.

.


Cartoon-style intermission is added to each intermission and battle to proceed with the entire scenario.

=============================================
steam deck it will be launched in desktop mode. !!!
=============================================

"Player" is a dangerous trade route, protecting Arm merchant Ship carrying merchants traveling through the "Starry Sky." You will fight with the Battle Titan 'Rainbow'."

It is a retro mechanic shooter based on Pixel Art with RPG-like growth Factors, and is being developed as a shooting RPG in which you destroy powerful enemies with the support of various Equipment and Allies.

name: Battle Titan RAINBOW

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit / Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers, at least 512 MB of dedicated video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit / Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: Don't dodge the bullets, break through them! A new concept in Shm-up_RPG “Battle Titan RAINBOW”!
supported_languages:
English, Korean*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
